typography.rules: Headings must be 'Fredoka' for that friendly, rounded look. Body text 'DM Sans' for high readability. Use tight tracking for large headings.

primary.name: Spicy Orange
primary.usage: Primary Buttons, CTAs, Highlights, Brand Logo

secondary.name: Fresh Green
secondary.usage: Success states, Vegetarian tags, Price badges, Accents

layout.spacing: Generous padding. Use p-6 or p-8 inside cards. Gap-8 for grids.
layout.border_radius: rounded-2xl or rounded-3xl for everything. No sharp corners.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold hover:scale-105 transition-transform shadow-[0_10px_20px_rgba(250,107,26,0.2)]
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-muted text-foreground rounded-full px-6 py-3 font-medium hover:border-primary hover:text-primary transition-colors

cards.restaurant: bg-card rounded-3xl overflow-hidden shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-2 transition-all duration-300 border border-border/50 group
cards.menu_item: bg-card rounded-2xl p-4 flex gap-4 items-center hover:bg-muted/50 transition-colors border border-border/30

inputs.style: bg-muted/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:bg-white focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary/10 rounded-xl h-12 px-4

assets.logo_style: Text based 'GoMcaddy' with a smile curve under 'Mcaddy' or a bike wheel icon.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}
motion.loading: Use a spinning plate or jumping burger animation.

universal_guidelines: Always use 'Fredoka' for headers. It is the brand voice.
Never use pure black shadows. Use colored shadows (orange/brown) for warmth.
Images must have 'object-cover' and rounded corners.
Use 'grid-cols-1' for mobile first. Don't break layout on small screens.
Use 'sonner' for toast notifications. Success = Green, Error = Red.
Payment integration (Paystack) should be mocked if keys are missing, but UI must be complete.
Do not use gradients for text. Keep text solid for readability.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update `index.css` with the provided CSS variables. 2. Install 'lucide-react', 'framer-motion', 'clsx', 'tailwind-merge'. 3. Create a 'Header' component with a sticky glassmorphism effect. 4. Build the 'RestaurantCard' component first as it is the core UI element. 5. Use the provided image URLs for the dummy data seeding.
